com.dyuproject.protostuff
Class XmlIOUtil

java.lang.Object
  com.dyuproject.protostuff.XmlIOUtil

public final class XmlIOUtil
extends Object

Utility for the XML serialization/deserialization of messages and objects tied to a schema.

Author:
David Yu
Date created:
May 24, 2010
